ResearchProjectDef.label: basic artisanal goods
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks a range of specialized artisanal processes, enabling colonists to craft unique products using traditional methods and tools.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex artisanal goods
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks a range of more complex artisanal processes. Enabling the creation of more complex and unique products.

ResearchProjectDef.label: food preservation techniques
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks a range of methods to preserve food such as pickling, aging, fermenting and various other methods, making food last longer unrefridgerated, more calorie dense, and tastier to boot!

ResearchProjectDef.label: specialty dishes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock a range of new food categories: Grills, Soups, Sushi, and Bakes along with their respective cooking stations. Specialty meals have a far better ratio of raw ingredients but need specific ingredients such as flour or olive oil to make. Additionally a variety of condiments can now be made and applied to gourmet meals applying a wide range of positive effects.
